# Lab book

The purpose of this file is to be a playground and place for
documentation at the same time. This is were you try different things,
and write about what you have tried and why, a place to write "dirty"
code so that the rest of your project can be kept clean. See this mostly
as a reference for your future self and use it in a way that makes sense
to you.

diarienummer

The categorical factors

-   sex- Gender

-   survival after 30 days- res_survival

-   highest hospital care level- host_care_level

-   GCS- ed_gcs_sum

-   respiratory rate- ed_rr_value

-   systolic blood pressure- ed_sbp_value

-   working hours

-   weekend

-   time from arrival at the hospital until first computed tomography
    (CT)- dt_ed_first_ct

-   if the patient was intubated- ed_intubated eller pre_intubated

We also included the continuous factors

-   age- pt_age_yrs

-   ISS- ISS
